title.rendered: Ehtuish Farag Ehtuish M.B., M.S., PH.D.

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1667689279186{margin-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #e2efff !important;}” el_class=”SPRow SPRowFull”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”9194″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Ehtuish Farag Ehtuish M.B., M.S., PH.D.” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%231e73be” google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:900%20bold%20regular%3A900%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1667689253851{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]President of the National General Authority for

Organ tissue and cell Transplantation LNGAOTCT[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Biography” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left|color:%231e73be” google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:900%20bold%20regular%3A900%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1667689244540{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”SpTitlesFull”]Full Professor of Surgery, Medical School-Tripoli University; 1999
Consultant Surgical Department Central Hospital; 1994 – 2011
Head surgery department, Medical school Tripoli 1996 – 2007
Minister of health for Libya 1998 – 2001
Director of General authority for environment “EGA” 2001 – 2003
Head surgery department Tripoli central hospital 2005 – Now
Director of the National Organ Transplant Program; 2003 – 2011
President of the National General Authority for Organ tissue and cell
Transplantation LNGAOTCT; 2019 – NOW
Member of Surgical Scientific Board of Libyan Board, Tripoli Libya;
Chairman, scientific board general surgery of Arab board for health
spec. Damascus Syria 2002 – 2011 and Amman Jordan 2018- Now
Chairman, Libyan society of Nephrology and Renal Transplantation
(LSNRT). 2005 – 2011
Chairman, Libyan Society of Endoscopic Surgery (LSES). 2006- 2011
Chairman, “Yeslibya” national movement 2016 – Now
Vice-Chairman, Committee for institutional unification, in the Libyan
National planning Council 2018 – Now
Head Committee for preparing National strategy for disaster
management (Coved 19 as an example) 2020[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row]
